ocean.question: I am big and blue and fishies swim in me. What am I?
I am a slippery creature that lives in the sea. I have fins and I swim around, who am I?
I have a shell and move very slowly on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my house on my back
⛱️ You might find me at the beach

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can squirt ink. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌑 I can make the water dark

ocean.question: I am a big fish with very sharp teeth. People are scared of me! What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 You might see me in a movie

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and walk sideways on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🚶 I walk in a funny way
🏝️ I like to hide under rocks

ocean.question: I am a very big sea creature that sings songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am the biggest animal in the world
🌊 I have a blowhole on my head

ocean.question: I look like a horse but I swim in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I curl my tail around things

ocean.question: I am a big animal that lives in the cold ocean. I have tusks and whiskers, what am I?

hints.text: 🦣 I have big teeth that stick out
👨‍🦳 I have a lot of whiskers

ocean.question: I'm a colorful creature that lives on the bottom of the sea, and I'm shaped like a star. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I have five arms or more
🌊 I live on the ocean floor

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am long and orange when grown up.
🐰 I am a yummy snack for rabbits.

plant.question: I am big and have leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I am colorful and smell sweet. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 Some people give me as a gift.

plant.question: I am long and green and grow on a vine. I can be a yummy pickle! What am I?

hints.text: 🥪 You can put me in a sandwich.

plant.question: I am a big fruit with a green rind and a red inside with black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: ⛱️ People like to eat me in the summer.
🌱 I grow on a vine on the ground.

plant.question: I am tall and strong, and houses are made from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 You can build things with me.
🔥 You can burn me in a fireplace.

plant.question: I have thorns and beautiful flowers. People like to give me as a gift to someone they love. What am I?

hints.text: 🥀 Be careful of my sharp parts!
💐 People give me for Valentine's Day.

plant.question: I am a green leafy vegetable that helps you be strong like Popeye! What am I?

hints.text: 💪 Eating me makes you super strong.
🥗 I am often eaten in salads.

plant.question: I grow in a field and have golden kernels. People eat me off the cob or in popcorn! What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 You can pop me and eat me at the movies.

plant.question: I am a seed that makes a yummy, gooey butter that you can spread on bread. What am I?

hints.text: 🥪 I am often used in a sandwich with jelly.
